Text: The council also held £18.8m-worth of directly owned property as well as offering out £910,000 in loans in 2018/19. After costs, these generated an extra £410,000.
Cause: The council also held £18.8m-worth of directly owned property as well as offering out £910,000 in loans in 2018/19.
Effect: After costs, these generated an extra £410,000.
Sentence: <e1>The council also held £18.8m-worth of directly owned property as well as offering out £910,000 in loans in 2018/19.</e1> <e2>After costs, these generated an extra £410,000.</e2>
